abstract.p: List of sources for bargain-priced designer clothing in New York

block.p: November and December are hot months for sample sales, with more than 70 this week. The fashion shows just ended so designers, manufacturers and middle men have time to open their doors to sell off their excess inventory to the public. Merchandise is generally at least half off the retail price, sometimes more. Biggest savings are on damaged merchandise, items from last season and those made in sample sizes (for men, small; for women, size 6 and 8).

''The best time to go is the first day of the sale, but if you go on the last day, they generally mark the prices way down,'' said Ann Rizzo, editor of the S & B Report, a monthly guide to the sales. Here are some of this week's top sales, according to The S&B Report.
J. CREW
Preppy sportswear.
Where Clipper Club, 636 Avenue of the Americas, at 19th Street, main floor.
When Wednesday and Thursday, 10 A.M. to 8 P.M.
JOSEPH ABBOUD
Men's fall and winter suits, sport jackets, trousers and sweaters.
Prices half off retail.
Where 20 West 43d Street, between Fifth Avenue and Avenue of the Americas, 19th floor.
When Tuesday, 9 A.M. to 7 P.M., Wednesday and Thursday, 9 A.M. to 6 P.M.
MALO CASHMERE
Italian cashmere knitwear for men and women. Leather handbags for women
Prices Wholesale.
Where 560 Seventh Avenue, at 40th Street, 2d floor;
When Tuesday through Thursday, 9 A.M. to 6:30 P.M., Friday, 9 A.M. to 5 P.M.
VAKKO/MARK EISEN
Trendy leather jackets and coats for women. All sizes.
High-end dresses, suits and sportswear for women.
Prices half off retail.
Where 134 West 37th Street, between Broadway and Seventh Avenue, 2d floor.
When Monday to Friday, 9 A.M. to 6 P.M., Thursday till 7 P.M.
WATHNE
Ralph Lauren and Polo handbags and luggage; Wathne clothes for women.
Prices half off retail and more.
Where 1095 Cranbury South River Road, Jamesburg, N.J.
When Saturday, 8 A.M. to 4 P.M.
TSE CASHMERE
Trendy cashmere sweaters for men, women and children.
Prices half off retail and below.
Where 480 Broome Street, between Wooster and Greene Streets, ground floor.
When Thursday to Saturday, 11 A.M. to 6 P.M., Sunday, Noon to 3 P.M.
